column4: Can someone help me with my Graphic Drivers? They won't let me enable 3d acceleration when they are supposed to...
Can someone help me with my Graphic Drivers? They won't let me enable 3d acceleration when they are supposed to...
oops
what kind of graphics driver do you have?
Ive got a laptop with an integrated card, the "Screens and graphics" thingy detects my card as Intel 945.
so... wolfjb and sgwizdak ? Anything for me?
what kind of problems are you having?
It's not a resolution problem wolfjb
and sgwizdak, the thing is, when I logon
it says that Ubuntu has to run in low graphics mode, and then when I enable the 3d accelation (after slecting the right driver) it says that the visual effects couldnt be enabled..
And my drivers always get back to the default ones in the panel.
hmm, and this is a new 7.10 install?
Yes it is sgwizdak
It is working on my job mate's Laptop (The same laptop)
sounds like a driver issue, your best bet is to search/post to ubuntuforums.org and request help. Be sure to include the make of your laptop and all the information you can about your video card.
Ok
Thanks for your help
no worries. some people with 945 chipsets claim everything works, and other people are having problems
If I log out/on, will the X server restart?
nah, the display manager and server stay up
only the x-session restarts
